text: praqjApa#tiqrvAva jyEShThaqH sa hyE#tEnAgrE&ya#jata praqjApa#tirakAmayataq pra jA#yEqyEtiq sa mu#KaqtastriqvRutaqM nira#mimItaq tamaqgnirdEqvatA &nva#sRujyata gAyaqtrI CandO# rathantaqra(gm) sAma# brAhmaqNO ma#nuqShyA#NAmaqjaH pa#SUqnAM tasmAqt tE muKyA# muKaqtO hyasRu#jyaqntOra#sO bAqhuByA$M pa~jcadaqSaM nira#mimItaq tamindrO# dEqvatA&nva#sRujyata triqShTup CandO# bRuqhath - [  ] 4
